message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. I can sell the product to you for $82.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice! However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $75? That's the lowest I can go.
I understand you're trying to be reasonable, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell the product to you for $80.50. That's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between your last offer and my previous counteroffer. Can you consider $77.50?
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob! I can sell the product to you for $79. I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
I understand you're getting close to your minimum, Alice, but I'm still trying to stretch my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $78. Can you consider that?
I'm really close to my minimum, Bob! I can sell the product to you for $79.50. That's as low as I can go.
I understand you're really close to your minimum, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $78.50. That's the lowest I can go.
